casebody.data:
STATE of North. Carolina
v.
Lavoris Monteiz BATTLE. No. 422P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lavoris Monteiz Battle. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State. Prior report: 172 N.C.App. 335 , 615 S.E.2d 733 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 10th day of August 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of December 2006."
